summary: This module implements the Home Assistant alarm control panel component. It defines a generic alarm entity that encapsulates state, code handling and supported arming modes, registers the standard alarm services (arm away, arm home, arm night, arm custom bypass, disarm, trigger), provides an asynchronous service dispatcher, and initializes the component within Home Assistant.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant to integrate with various alarm systems, allowing users to control and monitor alarm panels through unified services and state attributes.
